product_name: FalconGuides Camping Virginia and West Virginia
long_description: . Author: Desiree Smith-Daughety. Softcover; 313 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Morris Book Publishing LLC; copyright 2013. Provides locations, GPS coordinates for each campground, directions, site maps, dates of operation and details about facilities, hookups, fees, reservations and activities. .
short_description: Camping Virginia and West Virginia offers comprehensive information on more than 130 public tent and RV campgrounds throughout the two states.
